    • level

      default ChallengesApiAuthCommon.ChallengeAIParams level(int level)
      Parameters:
      level - AI strength, from 1 to 8. Any other value will result in level 1 or 8.

    • fen

      @Deprecated default ChallengesApiAuthCommon.ChallengeAIParams fen(String fen)
      Deprecated.
      use variant(Variant) with position
      Parameters:
      fen - Custom initial position (in FEN).

      Default: "rnbqkbnr/pppppppp/8/8/8/8/PPPPPPPP/RNBQKBNR w KQkq - 0 1"
